title: There is a pool in our neighborhood that has not been cleaned or used in at least a year.  It is a lovely scum-green color, and often has frogs in/near it.  My yard seems to have more mosquitoes then usual this year, and I am afraid they are coming from this derelict pool.  Is there a department in the city or county that looks into problems like that?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18
